entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 6. Wind chill minus 18 this morning and minus 12 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 24 February 2023
